alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 8:40PM EDT until May 16 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BLADEN...NORTHWESTERN COLUMBUS AND NORTH CENTRAL HORRY COUNTIES... At 839 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elkton to near Cherry Grove, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Chadbourn, Abbottsburg, Lisbon, Cherry Grove, Sidney, Elkton, Emerson, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Williams, Brunswick, Clarkton, and Cerro Gordo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
